text: (ai rasool) tum poochho ki khuda ko chhod kar jinakee tum ibaadat karate ho kya tumane unako dekha hai mujhe bhee to dikhao ki un logon ne zameen mein kya cheeze paida kee hain ya aasamaanon (ke banaane) mein unakee shirakat hai to agar tum sachche ho to usase pahale kee koee kitaab (ya agalon ke) ilm ka baqiya ho to mere saamane pesh karo
